hasMenuItem.name: Blueberry Açaí Bowl
hasMenuItem.description:
Base: almond milk, açaí*, banana, blueberry, arrowroot, almond butter, and your choice of protein. Garnish: banana, blueberry, almonds, and hemp granola. PLEASE NOTE: WE ARE CURRENTLY OUT OF FRESH BLUEBERRIES DUE TO A SHORTAGE ISSUE. PLEASE LET US KNOW YOUR SUBSTITUTION CHOICE. WE APOLOGIZE FOR THE INCONVENIENCE.

*Acai contains Guarana, a natural source of caffeine

review.reviewBody: Refreshing and lots of good options for add-ons. Pretty filling and generous - we shared as a dessert between three adults after a good dinner. Could see this also as a whole meal by adding fresh fruit options.
The bananas were not as fresh this time as it had browning edges ... however the bowl was still yummy.

Really terrible. I'm at a loss for words. The blueberry acai bowls I receive never have granola at the bottom of the bowl even though that is the recipe. Not only that but I paid for and asked for extra granola and I never get it. And to top it off, I was given chocolate protein in my last 2 bowls though the recipe specifically calls for vanilla. It was so gross. This used to be a great location but it's all gone downhill in the last 2 years. This has happened 6 times that I've gotten the wrong order and I'm all out of patience. You've lost a customer. What a shame. Would give no stars if I could.
Took half hour to confirm order. Ordered Breakfast Cookie  but received everyday cookie. Very dissatisfied.
